answers.answer: They check for protein and sugars in your urine. Not sure what the protein represents but sugars could be a sign of gestational diabetes
Protein could mean preclasmpia (however you spell it) could make you have the baby early. But they also check for any infection as well.

question: Why do they say pee in a cup every time?? What do they do with it? Whats it for
title: dr. apts
